SummaryEnglish: Dexter is the dashing Ace hero who fights against Bort and his Infanto Ray, which turns beings into infants. Alongside Ace is his girlfriend, Kimberly, who helps fight Bort and his goons when she's not being abducted. When Dexter gets hit by the ray, he turns into his gangly younger self, and has to depend on his wits to defeat Bort, while he is without strength.

1.SummaryEnglish: You guide Ace through various dangers as you fight to save his girlfriend Kimberly, from the villain, Borf.
Borf's direct attack on the Moon Colony masks his true plan, which involves using the Infanto Ray on his Groots and getting Trader Ed to sell them to the unsuspecting colonists.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ace & Kim are assigned to watch a group of kids (including Vaughn's nephew)on a camping trip; Borf makes the task more difficult than they expected.

3.SummaryEnglish: Borf attempts to kidnap schoolgirl (and inventor) Emmy Sue Perkins to help him create the ultimate weapon; however Ace (as Dexter) disguises himself as the girl to thwart his plan.

4.SummaryEnglish: Ace and Kimberly infiltrate a space biker gang in an effort to keep Borf from blasting the Earth with a top secret missile.

5.SummaryEnglish: Ace and Kimberly must team up with Borf to keep (Commander) Parch (of Drix) from stealing all of Earth's water.

6.SummaryEnglish: An ancient alien creature thaws out of its icy prison; Ace & Kimberly have to get it back from Borf (who wants to train it to be his attack beast).

7.SummaryEnglish: Borf accidentally gets hit by his Infanto Ray and is transformed into a teenager. Borf and Ace (Dexter) must race (and fight)each other to the Age Ray, which each hope will make them normal.

8.SummaryEnglish: Vaughn sends Ace and Kimberly to a frontier planet to assist the local authorities. The crook that's giving 'em such a rough time just happens to bear an uncanny resemblance to Dexter...

9.SummaryEnglish: Officer Kimberly and Space Ace discover what seems to be an abandoned spaceship. When they explore it, the Space Command officers discover that the ship belongs to an alien mad scientist who wants a strong life force to animate his monster.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kimberly gets stuck with guard duty at Space Command HQ while Ace competes in the Galaxy Games. Naturally, Borf tries to capitalize on this situation.

11.SummaryEnglish: Borf uses his Infanto Ray on Kimberly and it has a delayed effect. Young Kimmie must escape and try to get back to normal while trying help other Infanto Ray victims escape as well.

12.SummaryEnglish: Borf has an evil plan to capture Space Marshall Vaughn & 2 planetary leaders when the Cosmic Circus comes to Earth.

13.SummaryEnglish: Space Marshall Vaughn and two other Space Command Officers got hit by the Infanto Ray. Ace & Kim had to deal with that and kick Borf's big blue butt out of the Moon Colony.
